actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to designate the week commencing with the fourth Monday in June 1982 as "National NCO/Petty Officer Week".

summary.text: (Measure passed House) Designates the week commencing the fourth Monday in June 1982 as National NCO/Petty Officer Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the week commencing with the fourth Monday in June 1982 as "National NCO/Petty Officer Week".
